actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to provide that national and international labor organizations, and intermediate labor organization bodies, shall elect their officers by secret ballot.

summary.text: Provides, under the Labor Management Reporting and Disclosure Act, that national and international labor organizations, and intermediate labor organization bodies, shall elect their officers by secret ballot.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to provide that national and international labor organizations, and intermediate labor organization bodies, shall elect their officers by secret ballot.
